name: title_title_abs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool poetry_db.
Tool description: PoetryDB is the world's first API for Next Generation internet poets
API description: Retrieves all poems with a specific title using the Thundercomb Poetry DB API.

title.description: The exact title of the poem.
title.default: Sonnet 18: Shall I compare thee to a summer's day?
